name: vue-goal
description: A Vue component to display fundraising goals with a pure animated HTML/CSS thermometer.

scripts.release-patch: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version patch; npm run release;
scripts.release-minor: git add -A && npm run commit && npm run build && npm version minor; npm run release;
scripts.release-major: git add -A && npm run commit && npm run build && npm version major; npm run release;
scripts.release: npm run commit; npm publish; git push --follow-tags;
